label: HedElement
Description: Any item in a HED schema.
Comment: Used to anchor all items in both the structural schema and the tags.

label: HedSchema
Description: The overall structure of the HED schema by section.

label: HedTag
Description: A HED vocabulary term or node.
Comment: A HedElement that is in the HEDSchemaSection and represents a HED tag.

label: HedUnitClass
Description: A category of units such as acceleration units.
Comment: HED unit class definitions are in the HedUnitClassDefinitionSection section of the HED schema.

label: HedUnit
Description: A unit element such as seconds.
Comment: HED units have a isOfUnitType association with a HedUnitClass.
Equivalence: HedElement and (inSchemaSection HedUnitClassDefinitionSection) and (isOfUnitType some HedUnitClass)

label: HedUnitModifier
Description: A unit modifier such as kilo.
Comment: A unit modifier is in the HEDUnitModifierDefinitionSection of the HED schema.

label: HedValueClass
Description: Rules for a type of value provided by users to substitute for placeholders.
Comment: A value class is in the HedValueClassDefinitionSection of the HED schema.

label: HedHeader
Description: Contains the specification of the schema version and partnership.
Equivalence: HedElement and (inHedSection exactly 1 HedHeaderSection) and (version exactly 1 xsd:string) and (library max 1 xsd:string) and (unmerged 1 xsd:string) and (withStandard max 1 xsd:boolean)

label: HedPrologue
Description: The introductory text of a HED schema which describes is purpose and scope.

label: HedEpilogue
Description: The end piece text of a HED schema which describes sources and other reference material.
